official_title: A bill to amend the Act of April 17, 1954, which preserved within Manassas National Battlefield Park, Va., important historic properties relating to the battles of Manassas.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-389) Establishes as the boundaries of the Manassas National Battlefield Park, Virginia, the boundaries depicted on the map entitled "Boundary Map. Manassas National Battlefield Park" dated May l977. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation, purchase, or exchange, lands and interests located within these boundaries, except that property owned by the Commonwealth of Virginia may only be acquired by donation. Authorizes the Secretary to make arrangements for the removal or rerouting of roads within the battlefield so as to reduce adverse impacts on park values. Sets forth the rights of owners of improved property within such boundaries. Authorizes the appropriation of $8,500,000 for the acquisition of lands authorized to be acquired by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of April 17, 1954, which preserved within Manassas National Battlefield Park, Va., important historic properties relating to the battles of Manassas.
